title: Gabage outputs in tests
body:
## Bug Report

```
thread 0: no corresponding DEFAULT record for LOCK, key: k1\000\000\000\000\000\000\371, lock_ts: 100
```

comments_data.body: @MyonKeminta seems you add `println!` in test code? Please clean up them.
It's tikv-ctl's output messages. It seems I need to add a switch to control whether these messages should be printed out.
@MyonKeminta How about making everything printed by log?
@breeswish After unifying log format, I'm afraid tikv-ctl's output message won't be very friendly to human if so...
